basics.name: Niko Muukkonen

basics.summary: Front-end focused software developer with a deep passion for full-stack development and technology-driven leading of development teams. Proven track record of working on comprehensive software solutions, ranging from database management to user interface development

work.name: Gofore Oyj
work.summary: In addition to the previous, lead responsibility of development, used processes, technical details and specifications of the front end project for the same administrative web application. Provided consultation and support to other teams and team members, aiding them in the implementation and best practices of the front end side of the web application while making sure that the quality is maintained.

work.name: Gofore Oyj
work.summary: Full stack development of an administrative web application for a parking solution that handles the management of facilities, products, permits, pricing, sessions etc., employing a tech stack that included React (JavaScript), React Query, Ant Design, Java with Spring Boot, and MongoDB. Additionally, contributed to the development of a publicly accessible mobile application using React Native and TypeScript.

volunteer.summary: As a mentor for the board of the student association Linkki, I shared my past knowledge by providing guidance, advice and information of best practices, historical conventions and past experiences with the new board members. I also handled the basic introduction and education of association laws and activities to the new board members.

volunteer.organization: The Student Union of the University of Jyväskylä
volunteer.position: Deputy Member of The Council of Representatives
volunteer.summary:
The Council of Representatives is the Parliament of the Student Union and, as such, decides on the most important issues concerning the Union and its members. The Council is comprised of 41 representatives which are elected by the student body every other year.

Among other things, the Council has power over the rules, budgets, financial statements, loans and building projects of the Student Union. The Council also appoints the Board of Executives, its chair and the key staff of the Student Union, such as its Secretary General and Editor-in-Chief.

Linkki Jyväskylä ry is a sizeable student association for Mathematical Information Technology, and Educational Technology majors and minors in University of Jyväskylä. Association was founded back in 2006 and it operates Faculty of Information Technology, within the Student Union of the University of Jyväskylä.

Purpose of the association is act as gateway for students to the faculty, promote the community of its members, to provide various opportunities for hobbies and peer learning, and to support the progress of their members’ studies.

Savonlinna Youth Council (Savonlinnan nuorisovaltuusto) is a politically and religiously non-partisan, municipal group that promotes the interests of local youth. The role of the Youth Council is to: Promote opportunities for participation, influence and action by young people. It works under the auspices of the Board of Education and brings the young people's perspective to the preparation and decision-making of the city.

education.summary: Bachelor's thesis on Cybersecurity vulnerabilities of self driving vehicles (in Finnish).
University courses on electronics, energy technologies, chemistry, mathematics ja physics.

publications.name: Cybersecurity vulnerabilities of self driving vehicles

projects.name: Event screen for student associations
projects.description: An event screen made to be used in the student space Kattila of Linkki Jyväskylä ry and Algo ry. Displays information about future events of both student associations, local lunch lists and logos of the sponsors of the associations. The app automatically fetches the information for the screen from multiple sources, so very little to none maintenance is needed. Frontend developed with React and a small backend with Express/Node.js.
